name: Fairy Village
description: My Fairy Village consists of 3 patterns: A Toadstool House, A Knitted Acorn Capped House and a Real Acorn Capped House. All of them are knit on dpns, in the round. Decorations are done with embroidery (there are how to videos). Have fun making your ultimate fairy village!
suggested_yarn: Patons North America Classic Wool Worsted
full_text: My Fairy Village consists of 3 patterns: A Toadstool House, A Knitted Acorn Capped House and a Real Acorn Capped House. All of them are knit on dpns, in the round. Decorations are done with embroidery (there are how to videos). Have fun making your ultimate fairy village! I hope you enjoy this free pattern. Please make as many as you like and feel free to make them to sell :) Praise for Fairy Village Quick and easy and sooo cute! (Adente) So excited for this project. I love houses and these are adorable. ( procastonlater ) An absolutely cute fly agaric house that my fairies and elves love to move into. ( kleinesunfeines ) A little toadstool house in the big world. My wee gnome Gnorbert is getting his own home now. ( Omissi )
